title: Comparative Analysis of Information Literacy Research Trends: Focusing on South Korea and English-Speaking Countries

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in information retrieval and basic literature analysis
context.additional_context: Acquires and comparatively studies keyword network analysis methods using digital devices

learning_goals: Compare trends in information literacy research between Korea and English-speaking countries through keyword network analysis
Understand the importance of topics related to 'evaluation' and 'collaboration' in information literacy research and apply them to practical cases
Explain methodology for thematic analysis using academic databases (Scopus/KCI)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
